rooms.description: Spacious living room with Vastu-compliant south or east facing opening for positivity and energy, integrated with a modern industrial aesthetic using exposed brickwork.
Dining area designed adjacent to the living room; natural light via north windows aligned per Vastu.
Industrial kitchen with open shelving and a breakfast nook, designed for high functionality while incorporating Vastu recommendations such as east-facing entrance and clean energy circulation.
Functional servant quarters with essential amenities; small private space ensuring privacy yet integrated with main layout per local norms.
Multipurpose common area for family gatherings, work-from-home setup or leisure, designed to allow ample natural light and ventilation per industrial style aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entry door oriented towards the north in compliance with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Large south-facing window to enhance natural lighting and maintain industrial raw look while adhering to Vastu guidelines.
North facing windows for balanced energy flow.
